local_intent: Perceive the white_plate (with retries), move above to a safe offset, perform fine approach/alignment, and verify position prior to grasp.
assumptions: offset_z set to 0.02 as an allowed binned value (0.03 from GLOBAL_BT approximated to nearest available)
RetryUntilSuccessful(num_attempts=3) used to realize perception recovery from GLOBAL_BT failure_and_recovery
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT 'approach' phase: ensures detection of white_plate, executes MoveAbove and ApproachAndAlign, and verifies with IsAt before subsequent ComputeGraspPose/Pick steps.
